text:
WELCOME TO RIIIGEEEEEEEL AAAAAAAAND FRIEEEEEEEEENDS!!!

On this episode, our very special guest is an entrepreneur who's been rocking it up the InterGalactic stock exchange!

My mom has grounded me for dabbling in intergalactic affairs.

Sorry.
